com.salesforce.dva.argus.sdk

Class AlertService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesforce.dva.argus.sdk.AlertService

  • public class AlertService
extends Object
    Provides methods to manage alerts in Argus.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Alert createAlert(Alert alert)
      Creates a new alert.

      Creates a new trigger.

      Deletes all triggers for the given alert ID.

    • Method Detail

      • getAlerts

        public List<Alert> getAlerts()
                      throws IOException
        Returns all alerts the user is authorized to access.
        Returns:
        The list of alerts. Will never be null, but may be empty.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the server cannot be reached.

      • getAlert

        public Alert getAlert(BigInteger alertId)
               throws IOException
        Returns the alert for the given ID.
        Parameters:
        alertId - The alert ID.
        Returns:
        The alert for the given ID. May be null.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the server cannot be reached.

      • getNotifications

        public List<Notification> getNotifications(BigInteger alertId)
                                    throws IOException
        Returns all notifications for the given alert ID.
        Parameters:
        alertId - The alert ID.
        Returns:
        The list of notifications for the alert. Will never be null, but may be empty.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the server cannot be reached.

        Parameters:
        alertId - The alert ID.
        Returns:
        The triggers for the alert. Will never be null, but may be empty.

        IOException - If the server cannot be reached.

      • getTriggersForNotification

        public List<Trigger> getTriggersForNotification(BigInteger alertId,
                                                BigInteger notificationId)
                                         throws IOException
        Returns the triggers for the given alert ID and notification ID.
        Parameters:
        alertId - The alert ID.
        notificationId - The notification ID.
        Returns:
        The triggers linked with the notification for the specified alert.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the server cannot be reached.

        triggerId - The trigger ID.
        Returns:
        The trigger.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the server cannot be reached.

      • getTriggerIfAssigned

        public Trigger getTriggerIfAssigned(BigInteger alertId,
                                    BigInteger notificationId,
                                    BigInteger triggerId)
                             throws IOException
        Returns the trigger given the alert ID, notification ID and the trigger ID.
        Parameters:
        alertId - The alert ID.
        notificationId - The notification ID.
        triggerId - The trigger ID.
        Returns:
        The trigger if it's associated with the notification, or null otherwise.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the server cannot be reached.

      • createAlert

        public Alert createAlert(Alert alert)
                  throws IOException
        Creates a new alert.
        Parameters:
        alert - The alert to create with an un-populated ID field.
        Returns:
        The new alert having the ID field populated.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the server cannot be reached.

                         Alert alert)
                  throws IOException

        Parameters:
        alertId - The alert ID.
        alert - The updated alert information.
        Returns:
        The updated alert.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the server cannot be reached.

      • updateNotification

        public Notification updateNotification(BigInteger alertId,
                                       BigInteger notificationId,
                                       Notification notification)
                                throws IOException
        Updates an existing notification.
        Parameters:
        alertId - The ID of the alert that owns the notification.
        notificationId - The ID of the notification to update.
        notification - The updated notification information.
        Returns:
        The updated notification.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the server cannot be reached.

                             BigInteger triggerId,

                      throws IOException
        Updates an existing trigger.
        Parameters:
        alertId - The ID of the alert owning the trigger.
        triggerId - The ID of the trigger to update.
        trigger - The updated trigger information.
        Returns:
        The updated trigger.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the server cannot be reached.

      • createNotification

        public List<Notification> createNotification(BigInteger alertId,
                                             Notification notification)
                                      throws IOException
        Creates a new notification.
        Parameters:
        alertId - The ID of the alert that will own the notification.
        notification - The notification to create having an un-populated ID field.
        Returns:
        The notification having a populated ID field.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the server cannot be reached.

      • createTrigger

        public List<Trigger> createTrigger(BigInteger alertId,
                                   Trigger trigger)
                            throws IOException
        Creates a new trigger.
        Parameters:
        alertId - The ID of the alert that will own the trigger.
        trigger - The trigger to create having an un-populated ID field.
        Returns:
        The trigger having a populated ID field.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the server cannot be reached.

      • linkTrigger

        public Trigger linkTrigger(BigInteger alertId,
                           BigInteger notificationId,
                           BigInteger triggerId)
                    throws IOException
        Links a trigger to a notification.
        Parameters:
        alertId - The ID of the alert that owns the notification and the trigger.
        notificationId - The ID of the notification to link.
        triggerId - The ID of the trigger to link.
        Returns:
        The updated trigger.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the server cannot be reached.

      • deleteAlert

        public void deleteAlert(BigInteger alertId)
                 throws IOException
        Deletes an alert including its notifications and triggers.
        Parameters:
        alertId - The ID of the alert to delete.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the server cannot be reached.

      • deleteNotifications

        public void deleteNotifications(BigInteger alertId)
                         throws IOException
        Deletes all notifications for the given alert ID. Associated triggers are not deleted from the alert.
        Parameters:
        alertId - The ID of the alert for which notifications will be deleted.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the server cannot be reached.

      • deleteNotification

        public void deleteNotification(BigInteger alertId,
                               BigInteger notificationId)
                        throws IOException
        Deletes the notification for the given alert ID. Associated triggers are not deleted from the alert.
        Parameters:
        alertId - The ID of the alert from which the notification will be deleted.
        notificationId - The ID of the notification to delete.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the server cannot be reached.

      • deleteTriggers

        public void deleteTriggers(BigInteger alertId)
                    throws IOException
        Deletes all triggers for the given alert ID. Associated notifications are not deleted from the alert.
        Parameters:
        alertId - The ID of the alert from which triggers will be deleted.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the server cannot be reached.

      • deleteTrigger

        public void deleteTrigger(BigInteger alertId,
                          BigInteger triggerId)
                   throws IOException
        Deletes a trigger having the given ID and removes any associations with the alert or notifications.
        Parameters:
        alertId - The ID of the alert from which the trigger will be deleted.
        triggerId - The ID of the trigger to delete.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the server cannot be reached.

      • unlinkTriggers

        public void unlinkTriggers(BigInteger alertId,
                           BigInteger notificationId)
                    throws IOException
        Disassociates all triggers from the specified notification.
        Parameters:
        alertId - The ID of the alert that owns the notification.
        notificationId - The notification for which all triggers will be unlinked.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the server cannot be reached.

      • unlinkTrigger

        public void unlinkTrigger(BigInteger alertId,
                          BigInteger notificationId,
                          BigInteger triggerId)
                   throws IOException
        Unlinks the specified trigger from the specified notification.
        Parameters:
        alertId - The ID of the alert that owns the notification and the trigger.
        notificationId - The ID of the notification.
        triggerId - The ID of the trigger.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the server cannot be reached.
